p: Whole Genome sequences of P. maritimus MKU009 and P. maritimus DSM 17275 were downloaded from NCBI Genome database ( Yoon et al., 2003; Ganapathy et al., 2016). These two and SAMP strain genomes collectively were RAST annotated individually. Comparative analysis of three genome sequences belonging to P. maritimus was done by an ultra-fast bacterial pan-genome analysis pipeline (BPGA) ( Chaudhari et al., 2016).
